metadata.description: Balance and equilibrium reflexes aligning the body against gravity and during locomotion.
metadata.notes: Dedicated posture reflex registry separate from biomimetic balance controllers.

tonic_neck.stimulus: Proprioceptive shift from cervical rotation or flexion.
tonic_neck.afferent: Muscle spindles and joint receptors in upper cervical spine.
tonic_neck.integration: Vestibulospinal and propriospinal circuits adjusting limb tone.
tonic_neck.efferent: Alpha motor neurons to limb extensors and flexors.
tonic_neck.effector: Redistribution of limb tone favoring extension on the face side and flexion contralaterally.

righting.stimulus: Combined vestibular and visual cues indicating body tilt.
righting.afferent: Otolith organs and retinal slip detectors to vestibular nuclei.
righting.efferent: Spinal motor outputs to neck, trunk, and limb muscles.
righting.effector: Sequential adjustments bringing head and body back to vertical alignment.

equilibrium.stimulus: Center-of-mass displacement during standing or walking.
equilibrium.afferent: Proprioceptive feedback from ankles, knees, hips, and vestibular apparatus.
equilibrium.effector: Coordinated ankle, hip, and stepping strategies to maintain base of support.

locomotor_cpgs.stimulus: Initiation of gait or perturbations requiring phase reset.
locomotor_cpgs.afferent: Phase-dependent proprioceptive cues from limbs and vestibular input.
locomotor_cpgs.integration: Spinal central pattern generators modulated by supraspinal centers.
locomotor_cpgs.efferent: Segmental motor pools controlling rhythmic flexor/extensor bursts.
locomotor_cpgs.effector: Stable stepping rhythm synchronized with balance responses.

antigravity_tone.stimulus: Gravitational loading sensed by proprioceptors and vestibular otoliths.
antigravity_tone.afferent: Muscle spindles, Golgi organs, and vestibular afferents.
antigravity_tone.integration: Reticulospinal and vestibulospinal pathways maintaining extensor bias.
antigravity_tone.efferent: Gamma and alpha motor neuron activity in axial and proximal limb muscles.
antigravity_tone.effector: Sustained extensor tone preventing collapse during stance.
